column1: Arya ratna kUwe ca uktam tat yaTA kASyapa amAtya saMgRhItAH rAjAnaH sarva kAryANi kurvanti evam eva upAya kOSalya saMgRhItAH boDisattvasya psarva budDa kAryANi karoti atas eva kevalAm SUnyatAm sevamAnasya mA BUt nirvANa praveSaH iti
